**Legend:**
- âœ… **COMPLETED**: Story fully done, all ACs met, QA passed
- ğŸŸ¢ **IN PROGRESS**: Active development, on track
- âš ï¸ **CONCERNS/READY FOR REVIEW**: Issues identified, needs attention
